question:
You have bought some clothing online and are not satisfied with your purchase.
Write a letter to the company that you bought the clothing from. In your letter
Give details of the purchase 
Describe the problem
Explain why you need a replacement urgently
text: I am writing this to express my dissatisfaction with the service that I received from your online store.

Last Sunday, I ordered a long-sleeve blue stripe shirt from your online store, and the item code was SLS-1007. After I place the order I got order number R1330, and I paid 2500 rupees for the product including the delivery charges.

I received the package yesterday, and the moment I unwrapped the courier, I was shocked to find a casual dress instead of a party dress. Moreover, the colour and dress material was different. You can imagine how unpleasant it was to receive the wrong delivery of your much-awaited product.

I kindly request you to send my original package as soon as possible because I will be having a dinner party on the 25th of July, which means the next week Thursday. I ordered the shirt to wear on this occasion.
I would appreciate your immediate attention to this matter, and I look forward to hearing from you.
